<abstract><p>Abstract copyright UK Data Service and data collection copyright owner.</p>Demographic information specialists Experian Limited have made available a selection of their popular datasets at 2001 Lower Layer Super Output Area (LSOA) level. The data currently cover 2004-2005 and 2008-2011.<br> <br> These Experian data are restricted to staff and students from UK further/higher education institutions. If your intended use of the data involves partnership with or funding from any non-academic organisations or individuals, or if you are uncertain about whether your use of the data is entirely academic, please <a href="http://ukdataservice.ac.uk/help/get-in-touch.aspx" title="Get in touch">Get in touch</a>.<br> <br> </abstract>       <abstract><B>Main Topics</B>:<br>The data comprise:<ul><li>Mosaic Public Sector household counts for each LSOA</li><li>Total household counts for each LSOA</li><li>Median household income value for each LSOA</li><li>Population projections, by sex and 5 year age bands, for year of release, 5 and 10 years into the future, for each LSOA</li></ul></abstract>       <sumDscr>         <timePrd>2004-2005 and 2008-2011</timePrd>         <nation>United Kingdom</nation>         <geogUnit>Super Output Areas (Lower Layer)</geogUnit>         <anlyUnit>Administrative units (geographical/political)</anlyUnit>         <universe>National</universe>         <universe>Postcodes and households in the UK, aggregated to LSOA</universe>         <dataKind>Alpha/numeric data</dataKind>         <dataKind> Aggregate (macro) level</dataKind>       </sumDscr>     </stdyInfo>     <method>       <dataColl>         <timeMeth>Cross-sectional (one-time) study</timeMeth>         <sampProc>No sampling (total universe)</sampProc>         <collMode>Compilation or synthesis of existing material</collMode>         <sources />         <weight>No weighting used</weight>       </dataColl>     </method>     <dataAccs>       <setAvail>         <accsPlac>These data are held and distributed by the <a href=http://cdu.census.ac.uk>Census Dissemination Unit</a> (CDU) at MIMAS.</accsPlac>       </setAvail>       <useStmt>         <specPerm>Restricted access</specPerm>         <restrctn>Access is restricted to users in UK higher and further education institutions. Registration is required.</restrctn>         <contact><a href=http://www.ukdataservice.ac.uk/help/get-in-touch.aspx>Get in touch</a></contact>         <conditions>If your intended use of the data involves partnership with or funding from any non-academic organisations or individuals, or if you are uncertain about whether your use of the data is entirely academic, please <a href="http://ukdataservice.ac.uk/help/get-in-touch.aspx" title="Get in touch">Get in touch</a>.</conditions>       </useStmt>     </dataAccs>     <othrStdyMat>       <relPubl>   </relPubl>       <relPubl>   </relPubl>       <othRefs>Language Of Study Description: English</othRefs>       <othRefs>Language Of Study Documentation: English</othRefs>     </othrStdyMat>   </stdyDscr> </codeBook>
